remarks: The product of a family of Abelian groups is an Abelian group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdscmnd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdscmnd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdscmnd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsgabld.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Abel ) $.
prdsabld $p |- ( ph -> Y e. Abel ) $.
